name: Coulson Plot Generator

screenshots.caption: Coulson Plot showing many protein complexes across taxa
Screen shots of the Coulson Plot Generator program

short_description: For comparative plus/minus spreadsheet data, Coulson Plot Generator application creates a multiple pie diagram, for a rapid visual comparison of subunit occupancy across a range of entities. Numbers of pies, segments, labels and colours are customisable. Creates an editable PDF from a comma separated text file. Now with zoom capability and more memory, for larger datasets. Save images in several formats including SVG.
summary: Graphics generator for pie diagram matrix from spreadsheets
